verses.verse: To the chief Musician,<WH5329> A Psalm of David.<WH1732> The fool<WH5036> hath said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> There is no<WH369> God.<WH430> They are corrupt,<WH7843> they have done abominable<WH8581> works,<WH5949> there is none<WH369> that doeth<WH6213> good.<WH2896>

The LORD<WH3068> looked down<WH8259> from heaven<WH4480> <WH8064> upon<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of men,<WH120> to see<WH7200> if there were<WH3426> any that did understand,<WH7919> and seek<WH1875> <WH853> God.<WH430>
They are all<WH3605> gone aside,<WH5493> they are all together<WH3162> become filthy:<WH444> there is none<WH369> that doeth<WH6213> good,<WH2896> no,<WH369> not<WH1571> one.<WH259>

Have all<WH3605> the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205> no<WH3808> knowledge?<WH3045> who eat up<WH398> my people<WH5971> as they eat<WH398> bread,<WH3899> and call<WH7121> not<WH3808> upon the LORD.<WH3068>
There <WH8033> were they in great fear:<WH6342> <WH6343> for<WH3588> God<WH430> is in the generation<WH1755> of the righteous.<WH6662>
Ye have shamed<WH954> the counsel<WH6098> of the poor,<WH6041> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is his refuge.<WH4268>

Oh that<WH4310> <WH5414> the salvation<WH3444> of Israel<WH3478> were come out of Zion!<WH4480> <WH6726> when the LORD<WH3068> bringeth back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of his people,<WH5971> Jacob<WH3290> shall rejoice,<WH1523> and Israel<WH3478> shall be glad.<WH8055>
